website_summaries.verdict: This uniquely mild formula is free of harsh ingredients that irritate sensitive or damaged teeth and gums. Appreciated by those who prefer a mild toothpaste flavor.
pros: Doesn’t contain sodium lauryl sulfate, which can irritate canker sores
Made with plant-derived xylitol, an effective ingredient for keeping plaque at bay
Despite its mild peppermint flavor, the formula helps neutralize bad breath
cons: Flavor strength can be hit-or-miss: some consumers say it’s pleasantly mild, whereas others claim it doesn’t do enough in the way of freshening

customer_reviews.title: THIS PASTE WILL RID YOUR CANKER SORES FOR LIFE!
customer_reviews.text: My son had suffered from canker sores his entire life. Doctors only want to give numbing relief. I took a chance and bought him this toothpaste. He said as soon as some sores were going away new ones were festering. Also, he had a mouth full of sores when he started using the paste and he said it instantly gave him relief. He started using it in early April. since then, the old sores went away and he has not gotten a single sore! If I could give 10 stars I would. TRY THIS TOOTHPASTE IF YOU SUFFER FROM CONSTANT CANKER SORES! IT REALLY DOES WORK!
customer_reviews.author: Doris Benson

customer_reviews.title: Squiggle
customer_reviews.text: When I was going through chemo several years ago, a friend recommended this toothpaste to help prevent mouth sores from the chemo as it had worked for her. Since then I have recommended it to MANY others going through chem. I purchased this for a friend who is just starting her cancer journey. It is truly one of the best products I have ever used and would recommend it for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: IowaMom

customer_reviews.title: Squigle
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste is expensive, no question about it. So why would you want to buy expensive toothpaste when there's so many cheaper varieties available? Answer: Because it works! After you've used a full tube of this, you won't want to use any other toothpaste again. And the next time you go to your dentist for a cleaning, you'll walk out with a smile as he says, "GOOD Checkup!" Trust me, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Cajun-Yankee

customer_reviews.title: I have used natural toothpaste for years, but this is by far my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I have used natural toothpaste for years, but this is by far my favorite. A small company that makes a quality product - that works great! The xylitol actually repels plaque on your teeth. I used to get a least one small cavity every other year, and since I've been using this toothpaste for the past 3 years, my dental check-ups always go great. No cavities! Besides working effectively, I like the fact that I am supporting a small business and not a huge corporate entity. Thanks Squigle!
customer_reviews.author: R. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: SkinSafe Product's website identified this as the best one for her
customer_reviews.text: My wife has major lip allergies caused by toothpaste. Mayo Clinic identified the cause and created a profile of her allergies on SkinSafe's website. Using her profile, SkinSafe Product's website identified this as the best one for her. Best of all ... no more lip issues!
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive and dry mouths
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely dry mouth and it is very sensitive to flavors, particularly strong mint. The flavor in this toothpaste is very mild, and I can tolerate it. The one unappealing feature is that it almost melts in your mouth and is loose on the toothbrush, you have to be very careful brushing or you make a mess everywhere. I believe that is from the xylitol which I DESPERATELY need. It helps soothes my mouth and I understand it also helps guard against cavities. The same messy thing happened when I used another toothpaste with xylitol (the brand is no longer available). PLEASE KEEP MAKING/DISTRIBUTING THIS TOOTHPASTE, I NEED IT. Thank you very much for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Sue

customer_reviews.title: good toothpaste for canker-sore sufferers
customer_reviews.text: good toothpaste for canker-sore sufferers - had to find replacement for rembrandt's discontinued paste. As with most toothpastes that don't contain SLS - is a little strange as far as texture goes - hard to describe exactly (doesn't really foam, but gets an almost creamy consistency with brushing), but you get used to it after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Sores are a thing of the past
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Squigle for almost three years and have had only one canker sore in that entire time. Prior to that I was using Crest and had sores 3-4 times a year. They seemed to be worse the older I got which prompted me to try something new. Glad I did! Wish it were cheaper, and I wish they packaged the product in a standard tube instead of the "fancy" but less functional, less practical tube they chose. Note to designers: if the wheel works, why change it? You'll only mess it up.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Not minty enough, does not clean my teeth.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this toothpaste a better review as I had such high hopes for it. I suffer from Perioral Dermatitis and thought this would work well for me. There is not much flavor to the toothpaste, which as first I didn't think I would mind. But, honestly, I feel a little nervous to even kiss my husband after using it, because it does not freshen your breath or mouth longer than a minute. Also, I have great teeth and always get complimented by my dental hygienist, but this stuff does NOT clean my teeth. I find myself brushing a second time with a stronger toothpaste which just makes this Squigle useless.
customer_reviews.author: kpalm

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great
customer_reviews.text: I get canker sores pretty frequently, probably at least once a week. This toothpaste is okay, I still got a canker sore despite brushing twice a day with this. However, it does not irritate my sores like normal toothpaste does, which is why I'm ok with the product. The taste is mint but really weak. It does not foam up like normal toothpaste so I'm not sure if it's cleaning to the same degree. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love Squigle!
customer_reviews.text: The first time someone mentioned to me about a toothpaste that helps with dry mouth I thought they were joking on the name. Well I was very surprised when I found it on Amazon and bought a 2 pack, that was 3-4 years ago now. I continue to order it; I refuse to travel without it, I love it so much I have bought it for others that have never heard of it. I even send people the link to the product. Most people use a different brand but Squigle works so much better. I ran out of it once and I noticed the difference in two day's had to order more. "Try it! You'll love it too!"
customer_reviews.author: TessaD

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE BURNING MOUTH SYNDROME PAIN!
customer_reviews.text: I have burning mouth syndrome and geographical tongue, and it's gotten so painful that I couldn't use my regular toothpaste. I tried everything - all the "natural" toothpastes, etc . This is the ONLY one that didn't burn! The light mint taste is pleasant as well. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Babzter

customer_reviews.title: Something is wrong the quality/manufacturing of 2018 Squiggle toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: Something is wrong the quality/manufacturing of 2018 Squiggle toothpaste I have been using Squiggle toothpaste for many years and recommended to friends and family. However the last batch of Squiggle I bought from amazon.com four tootepaste caps break off out of six toothpastes. I think it is a combination of difficult to open on first new opening of cap + weak cap. 4 out of 6 of the Squiggle I bought from amazon.com had the caps break off halfway on initial opening. I thought it was coincidence the first time, but it seems something with the cap quality went down. I bought 3 of 2 pack squiggles in July, 2018 on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: P. Yong

customer_reviews.title: Solid. I love it. Taste is good and not overpowering.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I tried everything. Finally stopped having the dentist tell me I have a cavity every time I go in. I use this 2-3 times a day and floss 5 days a week. Trying to get flossing everyday but hey, who’s perfect , right? Overall love this.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: very mild
customer_reviews.text: It is great that this product does not burn my sensitive mouth. However, I find I have to brush twice. I'm a gentle, but thorough brusher. Yet still after rinsing the first time, I can feel places that just didn't come clean, and have to do a second round. Rather bothersome for such an expensive toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: A. White

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: If you have issues with having mouth ulcers (because of Behcet disease, infections...) then you do not need to look any farther. This product is very gentle and soft of gums and teeth.
customer_reviews.author: afaik

customer_reviews.title: A little bit pricy but works fine
customer_reviews.text: I brought two toothpastes because I want to try it out the good and expensive ones. I have some teeth problems because it hurts. It turns out works fine but a little bit pricy.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: It’s just an average toothpaste valued at a high price. The taste is not bad but it does not help with my canker sores. It does not sooth, nor help prevent, which was the main purpose of me buying the product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good toothpaste. I suppose that it reduces canker sores
customer_reviews.text: Good toothpaste. I suppose that it reduces canker sores; I feel that the frequency of my canker sores has gone down, but I cannot verify that claim empirically. I will say that if I have a canker sore, this toothpaste is much less painful during brushing than common toothpastes like Crest or Colgate that contain SLS (sodium lauryl sulfate).
customer_reviews.author: Sean of SeanTek®

customer_reviews.title: Great toothpaste if you have a sensitivity to the ingredients in regular toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: I had never heard of this toothpaste before until my doctor recommended this. Works well and the only complaint I have is price compared to the average toothpaste in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Heather C

customer_reviews.title: I love it other than that
customer_reviews.text: When I realized I was getting a lot of canker sores due to sodium laurel sulfate I did some research and decided to try squiggle. I do wish it was a little bit more sudsy but that is probably due to the lack of sulfate which is what I needed. I love it other than that! I rarely get a canker sore now.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: pure ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Some thing is regular toothpaste that I'm allergic to. This toothpaste does not cause any issues. Mild taste. Works well
customer_reviews.author: Robyn T.

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for other toothpaste. Easy on a child’s mouth
customer_reviews.text: Bought this toothpaste because my grandson cannot use regular toothpaste. Seems to be ok. He doesn’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: Scay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tooth paste for sensitive mouth. My Dentist recommended this toothpaste Love it Already ordered more
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Ertman

customer_reviews.title: Pending results
customer_reviews.text: I did not noticed any difference..after using it for 3 weeks... Maybe the results will be noticeable later.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Gentle toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: Best toothpaste I've found with fluoride and NO SLS. Doesn't burn like many toothpastes.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie R

customer_reviews.title: I'm sensitive to artificial flavor and this toothpaste is great for me
customer_reviews.text: Very mellow taste of peppermint. It doesn't burn your mouth. I'm sensitive to artificial flavor and this toothpaste is great for me. It's very pure taste. Very recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Good for people with canker sores
customer_reviews.text: Great to help you if you’re prone to canker sores. It doesn’t irritate them as much as regular toothpaste does.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R.

customer_reviews.title: Supposed to be very good
customer_reviews.text: Seems like regular toothpaste...no issues with taste or texture. It is supposed to be good with preventing decay more so than other toothpastes, but will need to use for a while to determine if it holds up to that claim.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Sketchy toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste does not print Drug Facts or a list of ingredients on the tube or packaging. When I used it, it foamed in my mouth like toothpaste containing SLS does. Since I can't check the list of ingredients, I don't believe it when the tube says it doesn't contain SLS. I'm definitely not using a toothpaste that does not list the ingredients or Drug Facts!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this toothpaste. Have dry mouth issues and this really helps and it works great too!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne K.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I'm allergic to corn and corn biproducts. This is the only toothpaste that doesn't make my mouth bleed. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than Rembrandt G
customer_reviews.text: Having been a Rembrandt G user for so long, I panicked when that product was taken off the market, knowing my canker sores would consequently return. I decided to try Squigle after much research. I'm sorry I didn't know about it before. It's even better than Rembrandt. UPDATE: Been using for about 10 years now and I've gotten less than 5 canker sores in total, when I used to have them more often than not.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: "mild mint" my butt
customer_reviews.text: Just as minty as any other mint toothpaste. My daughter, who has very sensitive taste buds, hates it.
customer_reviews.author: Xopher H

customer_reviews.title: Friednly Toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: I can brush my teeth before breakfast and it doesn't make fruits taste bad. With normal toothpaste strawberries and oranges taste awful.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my dentist for maintaining enamel. I quickly got used to the taste. I only use this toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: To treat dry lips
customer_reviews.text: My doctor prescribed this tooth paste to treat my dry lips problem. Not sure if this is helping, for I use Burt's Bees balm too. But I like this paste, it helps the sensitivity of my teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I get canker sores a lot so using this toothpaste helps to prevent it. The flavor is good.
customer_reviews.author: Rockyclouds

customer_reviews.title: I like the taste
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste, and I'm sure this is healthier than commercial brands. But doesn't leave breath smelling clean and fresh. We stopped using.
customer_reviews.author: maryanncello@yahoo.com

customer_reviews.title: Good, but my 4 year old still won't use it.
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is nice and I'm sure it does a good job. The only reason it gets 4 stars for me is that I bought it hoping my 4 year old would use it. He doesn't like it and won't brush with it. It was recommended by his dentist though, so I'm sure it is good stuff. Just not for my boy.
customer_reviews.author: penguin

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I have used it for several year
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have used it for several year. I have issues with toothpaste with too much mint, which is almost every brand on the market. This is very mild and helps prevent flare ups with my lichen planus issues. Teeth and mouth feel great. Anyone who has any issues with canker sores or gum issues should give this a try.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: My mouth reacts poorly to some types of toothpaste and I have a tendency to get mouthsores. Squigle tastes great, not strong or burny, and it reduces if not prevents my mouth issues. It costs more than the average store shelf toothpaste but I feel it is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Big Al

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for cancer sore prone people
customer_reviews.text: My brother, mom, and I have always had cancer sores. Switching to this toothpaste has probably cut it from an every two week problem to an every six week. Major quality of life win, i wish I’d known about this type of toothpaste when I was younger
customer_reviews.author: AnnArbor

customer_reviews.title: It’s toothpaste.
customer_reviews.text: Teeth feel clean. It’s minty. Not sure if it helps with auto-immune related sores.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Good for your mouth
customer_reviews.text: I got hooked on this a couple of years ago at the recommendation of my dentist. My teeth are so clean and I never get sick. The taste is fairly bland, not real minty, but overall seems to be a great product with a high % of xylitol.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the "no flavor" added which I bought before ...
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the "no flavor" added which I bought before and didn't like. Wish they'd make the no flouride option with peppermint!!! Little pricey, would like to see a bulk option with significant savings.
customer_reviews.author: Mel H

customer_reviews.title: Helps with skin irritation.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good tasting toothpaste and it helped with my peri-oral dermatitis. And it seems to last a long time. I purchased this a couple of months ago and still am on my first tube. I haven't had much if any temperature sensitivity either.
customer_reviews.author: bluefish

customer_reviews.title: My dental hygienist likes this
customer_reviews.text: I was glad to have found this toothpaste containing xylitol. My dental hygienist first told me that xylitol was good for your teeth. I order it in a bag as a sweetener from Amazon. Now I’m glad to find it in a toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: Bluebonnet

customer_reviews.title: A Bit of Money, But Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Extremely effective enamel builder. During most recent cleaning, dentist was very impressed with condition of enamel. Would/will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JenJen

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to its promise
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is that I used to get ulcers inside my mouth and after using Squigle I do not any longer, except very, very rarely. I've been using the product about 9 months and had nothing unusual come up in my normal dentist visit. It doesn't have the flavor of regular toothpaste, but you get used to that pretty quickly. It's been great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: This toothpaste is great for canker sore suffers
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste is great for canker sore suffers. It won't get rid of them but since I started using this toothpaste I get ALOT fewer ... at least 60% less. Also normally when I get them I get 6-10 either at the same time or spread over a couple weeks. Since using Squiggle I notice that when I do get them now all I get is 3-4 at a time. Hopefully other canker sore suffers will have the same results. If not I hear Toms of Maine also works well.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K.

customer_reviews.title: Canker sores gone
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t been able to eat tomatoes without getting canker sores. A few months ago I tried Squigle toothpaste. No more canker sores 🎉
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Helping so far
customer_reviews.text: Recommend by our dentist for my son who gets kancar sores. So far he has not had any so this may be the answer for kids with irritation in their mouth
customer_reviews.author: Kara Rappolt

customer_reviews.title: Used to have frequent episodes of gum and palate soreness ...
customer_reviews.text: Used to have frequent episodes of gum and palate soreness. Since I started using Squigle a couple of years ago, I've not had one episode.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must for chemo patients.
customer_reviews.text: Used this toothpaste throughout chemotherapy treatment for breast cancer and did not get one single mouth sore. Gentle and cleansing, mild flavor, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: L. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Helps relieve cancer sores.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this toothpaste for my canker sore relief, I just wish it didn't include fluoride.
customer_reviews.author: Vee Comstock

customer_reviews.title: Toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: Has the right amount of xylitol and my kids like it. We have seen improvement in teeth and gum health in just one month. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanna C.

customer_reviews.title: Really Good toothpaste for avoiding canker sores
customer_reviews.text: I've battled canker sores for eons and this toothpaste really has cut them way down. I still have to be careful not to eat anything too acidic, but Squiggle is making a big difference in itself.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Trissel

customer_reviews.title: Removes Mucus & Bacteria
customer_reviews.text: This is the best toothpaste. It really works at removing bacteria and mucus from your mouth. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for mouth sores.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to control canker sores and find it helpful. Each tube lasts a long time. A small amount is enough.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine S.

customer_reviews.title: helps keep teeth and gums  healthy
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste keeps the gums & teeth very healthy with natural , beneficial ingredients and mild minty taste

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and customer service was exceptional when I had a question. Only complaint is that the minty flavor doesn't last regarding breath freshening.
customer_reviews.author: C-line

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: For years I used Rembrandt Canker sore toothpaste with great success (very few canker sores) but when they quit making it I went in search of an alternative. I tried a few other SLS free toothpastes which didn't work and I got a TON of canker sores. Then I found Squigle and haven't had a single caker sore since.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great service. Finally found a tooth paste that does not burn my mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Love This Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tooth paste! I have dry mouth and Squigle assists in cleaning and moisturizing while other tooth pastes tend to dry my mouth out more.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G.  CSRP

customer_reviews.title: No SLS or burning
customer_reviews.text: I have oral lichen planus and this is the only thing that doesn't burn. No SLS, smooth texture with no grit, a very pleasant taste with NO burning mint. Highly recommend it! Best I've tried.

customer_reviews.title: Naturally! 😁
customer_reviews.text: Better than what you find in stores! Better on your teeth & gums!

customer_reviews.text: Great toothpaste for anyone who suffers with/from canker sores! It's the best product since Rembrandt pulled their canker sore toothpaste.

customer_reviews.title: Better than most
customer_reviews.text: This product works better than a lot of the other toothpaste I have tried. It seems to be better than the name brand products I bought from the local stores.

customer_reviews.title: Wife uses it and she loves it. I use ...
customer_reviews.text: Wife uses it and she loves it. I use it occasionally but see no difference except it is mild. I think it's overpriced.

customer_reviews.text: I've been using this everyday for 2+ years. My favorite toothpaste. You don't need a lot on your toothbrush.

customer_reviews.title: Squigle soothes mouth sores too!
customer_reviews.text: I tried Squigle in desperation, trying to find a toothpaste that would not give me sores in the corner of my mouth. The first time I tried Squigle - I had a sore in full swing on my lip. The product soothed the sore over night so by morning the throbbing stopped and the healing started. The taste is mildly minty and it makes my teeth feel really smooth. I am a total convert!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toothpaste, even though it's spendy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toothpaste, even though it's spendy. My husband had problems with canker sores, and hasn't had a major recurrence since my daughter recommended Squigle.

customer_reviews.title: The best combination of mouth and tooth protection.
customer_reviews.text: "Regular" toothpaste was abrasive - some of the other natural choices didn't offer flouride. This is the best. ZERO canker sores in the past year since I moved to Squigle. Thanks

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: So far it minimizes canker sores like Rembrandt used to. Gotten used to the different flavor. Hope they keep selling it. Good product.

customer_reviews.title: Great Toothpaste!!
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste is great. I am sensitive to many other toothpastes. My dentist turned me on to squiggle. It has a great tasted without the side effects.

customer_reviews.title: It's worked out great for me and hopefully it will do the same ...
customer_reviews.text: if you suffer with mouth sores and peri-oral dermatitis you should be willing to give this toothpaste a try. It's worked out great for me and hopefully it will do the same for you.
customer_reviews.author: Once Bitten - Twice Shy

customer_reviews.title: Dependable Standby
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years now (a decade at least.) MANY fewer canker sores than in my 20s and 30s and fewer cavities. Coincidence? Maybe but I'm super happy with this product, would not switch, and have turned my ten-year-old onto it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric A. d'Arbeloff

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Since I have been using this toothpaste I am feeling sensitivity in teeth and pain
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Polanco Frías

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best! Our kids love this! No strong taste of artificial ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Pokethekat

customer_reviews.title: Rembrandt canker sore replacement found
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy Rembrandt canker sore or their gentle care toothpaste. I've had canker sores my whole life and that toothpaste did the trick and for some reason avoiding chocolate helped which also caused me canker sores. Now that it is no longer being made I struggled with what to do. I had tried Toms of Maine toothpaste but actually didn't like it. Squiggle does the job, cleans well, and no canker sores. It doesn't have a strong flavor. I do find I have to use a little bit more than what I used with Rembrandt but it works great. I can't recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Toothpaste we buy most regularly
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this after many recommendations from others. It is now the toothpaste that I pretty much always buy for my family.
customer_reviews.author: K Buser

customer_reviews.title: He was getting them frequently and they were quite ulcerated and painful. So glad my mom found this product
customer_reviews.text: My little boy hasn't had a canker sore since he began using this toothpaste a couple of months ago! He was getting them frequently and they were quite ulcerated and painful. So glad my mom found this product!
customer_reviews.author: TinaShelle

customer_reviews.title: Great toothpaste!!
customer_reviews.text: I have perioral dermatitis and also my teeth are thinning in certain places. I will update after dental appt to see if this has helped. But it IS helping to prevent dermatitis as the chemicals that are irritating to my skin present in other toothpastes are not insquiggle. It tastes great and cleans my teeth well. When i need to boost it i sprinkle baking soda on top.
customer_reviews.author: Gina L

customer_reviews.title: my granddaughter had canker sores a great deal of the time
customer_reviews.text: my granddaughter had canker sores a great deal of the time. since using squiggle toothpaste not a one in 8 months
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: New toothpaste trial.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toothpaste because it is gentel on my teeth, does not scratch the enamel. So far, so good, it seems to do a good job cleaning my teeth without any abrasiveness. I think it is helping.
customer_reviews.author: Harriet

customer_reviews.title: Great source and very few out there to help with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great source and very few out there to help with canker sores on lips and tongue ... It does work on preventing them.
customer_reviews.author: Phil ballard

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Toothpaste without SLS (sodium lauryl sulfate) are the answer to my mouth ulcer problems (Canker Sores). After a lifetime of suffering with painful sores in my mouth, changing toothpaste eliminated about 80% of my ulcers. Then, simply reducing the amount of salty snacks I eat, I have ended my Canker sores forever. Squigle toothpaste is one of only a few toothpastes without SLS, and I am certainly glad I found it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary N. Shollenberger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best toothpaste! Been using it over 10 years. I won't use anything else .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Squigle Enamel Saver Toothpaste, Canker Sore Treatment. Helps Prevent Cavities, Plaque, Tartar, Perioral Dermatitis, Chapped Lips, Bad Breath - 2 Pack
feature_bullets: Squigle contains no sodium lauryl sulfate so it is ideal for Canker Sore sufferers
Helps prevent Canker Sores, Dry Mouth, Mouth Ulcers, Perioral Dermatitis
SQUIGLE has 36% by weight of Xylitol (Made from birch and beech trees). The more Xylitol in your toothpaste, the less plaque buildup in your mouth. Plaque is an irritant that triggers canker sores.
Very mild peppermint flavor with no artificial colors, preservatives, colors, sweeteners
